Tragis! Ini 5 Kisah Chef yang Meninggal Saat Sedang Masak
01 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



Jakarta - Perkejaan sebagai chef, melibatkan banyak aktivitas di dapur. Tapi malangnya, banyak chef yang meninggal tragis saat sedang masak.Menjadi seorang chef dibutuhkan keahlian serta dedikasi yang ekstra. Bekerja di dalam dapur, tentunya sangat melelahkan dan banyak tekanan. Meski begitu, hampir semua chef mencintai pekerjaan mereka.Namun, beberapa diantaranya harus berakhir tragis, dan merenggang nyawa di dalam dapur ketika mereka tengah memasak. Penyebab kematiannya cukup beragam, mulai dari pembunuhan, hingga kecelakaan yang fatal.Dilansir dari List Verse (01/11), berikut 5 kisah tragis dari chef yang meninggal dunia saat tengah memasak.Baca Juga: Makanan Terakhir Korban Pembunuhan Bisa Jadi Alat Identifikasi Pembunuhnya(sob/odi)


Foto: Istimewa

Pada tahun 2012 lalu di Streamer's Restaurant yang ada di Key Largo, Florida, Amerika, mengalami kejadian yang menyeramkan sekaligus tragis. Saat itu sang chef bernama Stephan Stolze, yang berusia 46 tahun datang dari dapur membawa pisau tajam, ke area restoran.Saat itu restoran baru saja akan dibuka, ia kemudian mengiris tenggorokannya dengan pisau itu, hingga banjir darah di sana. Ia melakukan aksi bunuh diri itu di hadapan para pelayan yang bingung, dan terkejut. Setelah mengiris tenggorokannya, Stephan lalu pergi ke apartemennya yang ada di lantai dua restoran itu.Menyaksikan kejadian ini, para pelayan yang masih histeris, langsung membersihkan darah itu karena sebentar lagi para tamu restoran akan datang. Beberapa menit kemudian, manajer restoran sudah menemukan Stephen tak bernyawa di lantai atas. Stephen bunuh diri, karena depresi setelah putus dengan kekasihnya.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Salah satu kafe di wilayah Nashville, Amerika, yaitu Germantown Cafe East sempat viral karena kisah tragis yang melibatkan seorang chef, sekaligus pemilik dari kafe itu yang bernama Jay Luther.Kejadian ini terjadi di tahun 2012, di mana pemilik kafe berusia 47 tahun itu meninggal dunia setelah terkunci, di dalam freezer berisi es kering untuk menyimpan bahan-bahan makanannya agar tetap segar. Saat itu kondisinya tengah mati lampu, dan Jay berada di dalam freezer untuk mengecek persediaan es kering, namun listrik tak lama menyala, dan pintu freezer itu terkunci otomatis.Jay yang tidak membawa ponsel, langsung panik, apalagi pintu freezer tak bisa dibuka dari dalam. Jay sempat menyalakan alarm, dan ada 4 polisi yang datang ke lokasi kejadian, namun para polisi menganggap itu alarm palsu karena tidak ada tanda-tanda pembobolan. Keesokan harinya, salah satu pegawai kafe menemukan Jay sudah tidak bernyawa, membeku, di dalam freezer itu.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Pada tahun 2014 lalu, seorang chef asal China bernama Peng Fan tengah menyiapkan hidangan untuk para tamu restorannya. Saat itu ia akan menyajikan sup ular, dengan ular cobra sebagai bahan utamanya. Fan sudah memotong kepala cobra itu, dan menyiapkan dagingnya.Setelah ia memasak sup ular itu, ia ingin membuang kepala cobra yang masih ada di dapur. Namun ketika Fan mengambil kepala cobra itu dengan tangannya, secara tiba-tiba kepala cobra yang sudah buntung itu, menggigit tangannya.Jeritannya dari dalam dapur, membuat pelayan hingga tamu restoran berlari ke dapur. Malangnya bisa dari ular cobra itu sudah masuk ke dalam tubuhnya, dan nyawa Fan pun tak tertolong ketika pihak medis sampai ke tempat kejadian.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Di tahun 2015, seorang chef asal Amerika bekerja di salah satu restoran yang ada di Brazil. Chef dengan nama Elovelton Dias ini, sangat menyukai pekerjaannya sebagai chef.Tapi di suatu hari, pihak kepolisian dipanggil oleh pihak restoran di jam makan malam. Pihak restoran menemukan Dias, sudah terbaring kaku tak bernyawa di atas lantai dapur, dengan darah yang membanjirinya. Luka tusuk di belakang punggungnya, menjadi penyebab kematiannya.Nyawa Dias tak tertolong, dan pembunuhnya ternyata adalah rekan sesama chefnya bernama Jaquan Huston. Saat itu Jaquan dan Dias terlibat pertengkaran, Jaquan pun menusuk Dias dengan pisau tajam. Setelah membunuh temannya, Jaquan langsung kabur dari dapur tapi berhasil ditangkap beberapa jam setelahnya.

(sob/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

Di tahun 2016, pemilik Lee's Cafe and Bistro, yang ada di Philadelphia, Amerika, memutuskan untuk mengecek bagian dapur yang ada di bawah restoran khas Vietnam itu. Sang pemilik bingung karena pesanan makanan pengunjung tak ada yang selesai.Ketika sampai di bawah, ia menemukan chef restoran tersebut yang bernama Thuong Nguyen, bersimbah darah dengan tenggorokannya yang teriris pisau tajam. Panik melihat hal ini, pemilik restoran langsung menghubungi polisi, namun nyawa Nguyen sudah tidak bisa diselamatkan.Setelah ditelusuri lebih lanjut, pembunuhnya bernama Noelle, dan masih menjadi buronan. Saat pembunuhan itu terjadi, hanya ada 5 pelanggan, dan 4 pegawai restoran yang ada di sana. Masih belum jelas motif dari pembunuhan ini.Baca Juga: Penusukan hingga Pembunuhan, Ini 5 Kejadian Kriminal Gara-gara Makanan

Tragic! These are 5 stories of chefs who died while cooking
01 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood



Jakarta - Perkeaian as a chef, involves many activities in the kitchen. But unfortunately, many chefs die tragically while cooking. Being a chef requires extra expertise and dedication. Working in the kitchen, of course, very tiring and a lot of pressure. Even so, almost all chefs love their work. However, some of them have to end tragically, and take their lives in the kitchen when they are cooking. The causes of death are quite diverse, ranging from murder, to fatal accidents. Reported from List Verse (01/11), here are 5 tragic stories from chefs who died while cooking. friend / odi)


Photo: Special

In 2012 at Streamer's Restaurant in Key Largo, Florida, United States, experienced a scary and tragic event. At that time the chef named Stephan Stolze, who was 46 years old came from the kitchen carrying a sharp knife, to the restaurant area. At that time the restaurant was just about to open, he then sliced his throat with the knife, until the flood of blood there. He committed suicide in the presence of confused, shocked servants. After slicing his throat, Stephan then went to his apartment on the second floor of the restaurant. Witnessing this incident, the waiters who were still hysterical, immediately cleaned up the blood because soon the restaurant guests would arrive. A few minutes later, the restaurant manager had found Stephen lifeless upstairs. Stephen committed suicide, due to depression after breaking up with his girlfriend.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

One of the cafes in the Nashville area, America, namely Germantown Cafe East was viral because of the tragic story involving a chef, as well as the owner of the cafe named Jay Luther. This incident occurred in 2012, where the 47-year-old cafe owner died after it is locked, in the freezer with dry ice to store the ingredients to keep it fresh. At that time the condition was off, and Jay was in the freezer to check the supply of dry ice, but the electricity was not on for a long time, and the freezer door was locked automatically. Jay who did not bring a cellphone, panicked immediately, moreover the freezer door couldn't be opened from the inside. Jay had turned on the alarm, and there were 4 policemen who came to the scene, but the police considered it a false alarm because there were no signs of burglary. The next day, one of the cafe employees found Jay dead, frozen, in the freezer.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

In 2014, a Chinese chef named Peng Fan was preparing dishes for his restaurant guests. At that time he will serve snake soup, with cobra snake as the main ingredient. Fan had already cut off the cobra's head, and prepared the meat. After he cooked the snake soup, he wanted to throw the cobra's head off in the kitchen. But when Fan took the cobra's head with his hand, suddenly the stubborn cobra's head bit his hand. His scream came from inside the kitchen, making waiters until the restaurant guests ran to the kitchen. Unfortunately, the cobra could have entered his body, and Fan's life was beyond help when the medical team arrived at the scene.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

In 2015, an American chef worked in one of the restaurants in Brazil. The chef by the name of Elovelton Dias, really liked his job as a chef. But one day, the police was called by the restaurant at dinner time. The restaurant found Dias, lying dead lifelessly on the kitchen floor, with blood flooding him. The stab wound behind his back, was the cause of his death. Dias's compound was beyond help, and the killer turned out to be his fellow chef named Jaquan Huston. At that time Jaquan and Dias got into a fight, Jaquan stabbed Dias with a sharp knife. After killing his friend, Jaquan ran away from the kitchen but was captured a few hours later.

(friend / odi)



Photo: Special

In 2016, the owner of Lee's Cafe and Bistro, located in Philadelphia, USA, decided to check the kitchen section under the typical Vietnamese restaurant. The owner was confused because none of the visitors' food orders were finished. When he reached the bottom, he found the restaurant's chef named Thuong Nguyen, covered in blood with his throat cut by a sharp knife. Panicked to see this, the restaurant owner immediately contacted the police, but Nguyen's life could not be saved. After further investigation, the killer named Noelle, and still a fugitive. At the time of the murder, there were only 5 customers, and 4 restaurant employees there. It remains unclear the motive for this murder.
